Surveil 1. You draw a card and you lose 1 life. [i](To surveil 1, look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)[/i]
Tether [i](Then if you cast this from your hand, you may exile it tethered to a creature you control. When it dies, you may cast this from exile without paying its mana cost.)[/i]
